channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得了得克萨斯州的选举，但他和海莉（Haley）在佛蒙特州的竞争十分激烈。拜登和特朗普横扫了迄今为止的所有角逐。请关注实时更新：
item.description:
Donald Trump won Texas, but he and Haley are in a tight race in Vermont. Biden and Trump have swept all the contests called so far. Follow live updates: https://t.co/XtyXSUU3zW https://t.co/XtyXSUU3zW

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: "哥斯拉减一》的导演山崎隆说："我想提醒观众，哥斯拉在某种程度上是原子弹和战争的隐喻。在这里，他解释了影片是如何通过视觉效果来突出这些主题的。
item.description:
“I wanted to remind audiences that Godzilla was a metaphor for the atom bomb and war, to some degree,” says Takashi Yamazaki, the director of “Godzilla Minus One.” Here he explains how the film visually drives home those themes. https://t.co/0I3vMwHKTY https://t.co/0I3vMwHKTY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 副州长马克-罗宾逊（Mark Robinson）赢得了北卡罗来纳州州长的共和党初选。罗宾逊以一系列有争议的言论而闻名，他将在竞争激烈的州长竞选中与总检察长乔希-斯坦因（Josh Stein）对决。
item.description:
Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson won the GOP primary for governor of North Carolina. Robinson, who is known for a slew of controversial comments, will face off against Attorney General Josh Stein in the competitive governor's race. https://t.co/UQ58KhOXX6 https://t.co/UQ58KhOXX6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: "如果你穿着袜子睡觉，你就是个神经病。"这一日益普遍的睡前建议引发了争议。
item.description:
“If you sleep in socks you’re a psychopath.” The increasingly common bedtime advice is kicking up controversy. https://t.co/Ux0xexiuPO https://t.co/Ux0xexiuPO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在北卡罗来纳州、田纳西州和俄克拉荷马州的共和党初选中取得了早期胜利，而拜登总统则横扫了早期的民主党竞选。随着其他州的投票结束，还会有更多结果：
item.description:
Donald Trump racked up early victories in the North Carolina, Tennessee and Oklahoma GOP primaries while President Biden has swept early Democratic races.

More results are coming as polls close in other states: https://t.co/ivonsfPFfA https://t.co/ivonsfPFfA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：唐纳德-特朗普是一个世纪以来第四位失去连任的民选总统。@gerardtbaker 写道：除非发生什么变化，否则拜登也将加入他的行列。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Donald Trump was only the fourth elected president in a century to lose re-election. But unless something changes Biden is set to join him on that short list, writes @gerardtbaker. https://t.co/2YGiS4EeVd https://t.co/2YGiS4EeVd

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在当今的 "勾搭 "文化中，性的竞争环境并不公平，但假装公平却符合男性的利益。路易丝-佩里写道，女性有权愤怒。
item.description:
In today’s hookup culture the sexual playing field is not even, but it suits men’s interests to pretend that it is. Women are entitled to be angry, writes Louise Perry. https://t.co/0ZrzCaF6Q5 https://t.co/0ZrzCaF6Q5

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：在咖啡行业，工会对星巴克的部分收购很可能意味着更高的价格和更差的服务。小罗伯特-H-博克（Robert H. Bork Jr.
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: In the coffee business, a partial union takeover of Starbucks likely will mean higher prices and worse service. No amount of sugar will make that go down any easier, writes Robert H. Bork Jr. https://t.co/BvfW3Yp4aj https://t.co/BvfW3Yp4aj

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普赢得了弗吉尼亚州的共和党初选。北卡罗来纳州的投票即将结束。那里的提前投票可能预示着尼基-黑利将度过一个漫长的夜晚。请关注实时更新。
item.description:
Donald Trump won Virginia's GOP primary. Polls close next in North Carolina. An early call there could signal a long night for Nikki Haley. Follow live updates. https://t.co/5D29GWmSLx https://t.co/5D29GWmSLx

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 鲁比马号在红海附近遭到袭击后，船员们有三个小时的时间试图拯救它和他们自己。
item.description:
After the Rubymar was hit in an attack near the Red Sea, the crew had three hours to try to save it—and themselves. https://t.co/DRfPNAnD7y https://t.co/DRfPNAnD7y

item.title: 委内瑞拉将于 7 月 28 日举行总统选举，总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗很可能在没有任何可信挑战者的情况下参选。
item.description:
Venezuela will hold presidential elections July 28, setting the stage for an election in which President Nicolás Maduro is likely to run without any credible challenger https://t.co/Pzxa8KH3sz https://t.co/Pzxa8KH3sz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 6, 2024

item.title: 拳击手奥斯卡-德拉霍亚（Oscar De La Hoya）在拉斯维加斯再下一城--这一次，他将在拉斯维加斯建造一座豪华住宅，其中包括一个价值 40 万美元的私人洞穴和一个向其职业生涯致敬的房间。
item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/gZMt37qfXG https://t.co/gZMt37qfXG

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 白莲花》和《苹果永不落》的主演杰克-莱西在看完《古惑仔》电影九分钟后，就知道自己想成为一名演员。"在那些早期的场景中发生的一些事情 超越了我之前看过的任何电影"
item.description:
Nine minutes into the "Goodfellas" movie, "White Lotus" and "Apples Never Fall" star Jake Lacy knew he wanted to be an actor. "There was something happening in those early scenes that exceeded anything I’d watched before." https://t.co/iNoGH9Fkht https://t.co/iNoGH9Fkht

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 我们毁了性爱吗？五位作家提出了一个问题：在人类最亲密的行为方面，社会是否已经迷失了方向？
item.description:
Have we ruined sex? Five writers ask whether society has lost its way when it comes to the most intimate of human acts. https://t.co/EpPhDTGFOj https://t.co/EpPhDTGFOj

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指
item.description:
Stay-at-home girlfriends have flooded TikTok with videos of self-care, cooking, cleaning and an idealized vision of a traditional marriage—minus the wedding ring https://t.co/A2mexTfYjJ https://t.co/A2mexTfYjJ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 随着 15 个州的选民投票，超级星期二可能成为妮基-黑利（Nikki Haley）与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）争夺共和党候选人提名的最后一战。请关注实时结果和分析。
item.description:
Super Tuesday could be Nikki Haley’s last stand against Donald Trump for the GOP nomination as voters in 15 states cast ballots. Follow for live results and analysis. https://t.co/yGmLaMioA3 https://t.co/yGmLaMioA3

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 游泳池非常大。牛排馆的烤土豆要 15 美元。这个佛罗里达州的新度假村是由......一家廉价航空公司经营的？
item.description:
The pools are massive. Au gratin potatoes cost $15 at the steakhouse. This new Florida resort is run by…a budget airline? https://t.co/UJahldCr0T pic.twitter.com/Vfxnc4d6IE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 两年前，当美国军方和情报官员正在制定阻止俄罗斯入侵乌克兰的方法时，一名退役陆军中校据称正在通过一款国外约会应用程序向一位恋爱对象提供机密信息
item.description:
As U.S. military and intelligence officials formulated ways to blunt Russia’s invasion of Ukraine two years ago, a retired Army lieutenant colonel was allegedly feeding classified information to a romantic interest via a foreign dating app https://t.co/4cfkP58s53

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 预计唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二将向成为共和党总统候选人迈出有力的一步，同时向尼基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）施加更大的压力，迫使她结束渺茫的竞选生涯
item.description:
Donald Trump was expected to take an emphatic step toward becoming the Republican presidential nominee Tuesday while putting more pressure on Nikki Haley to end her long-shot bid https://t.co/lmRHu21ITH https://t.co/lmRHu21ITH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在此之前，从未有候选人在竞选总统时面临刑事指控。前总统唐纳德-特朗普面临 91 项刑事指控以及民事索赔。以下是我们追踪的主要案件的最新进展。
item.description:
Never before has a candidate pursued the presidency while facing criminal charges. Former President Donald Trump faces 91 of them, as well as civil claims. Here’s the latest on the major cases we’re tracking. https://t.co/LwOP7J1yBy https://t.co/LwOP7J1yBy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 一些银行客户正在向小规模发展，以回击将存款和贷款集中在少数几家最大银行的合并浪潮
item.description:
Some bank customers are going small, pushing back against a wave of consolidation that has concentrated deposits and loans in a handful of the largest banks https://t.co/kmI2DBUDc6 https://t.co/kmI2DBUDc6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 5, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已经击败了除一人之外的所有共和党挑战者，剩下的竞争者尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）可能会在今天的 "超级星期二 "进行最后一搏。以下是目前的结果。
item.description:
Donald Trump has vanquished all of his Republican challengers except one, and remaining contender Nikki Haley is making what could be a final stand today on Super Tuesday. Here are the results so far. https://t.co/w1bNjWj86D https://t.co/w1bNjWj86D
